subject: Dont forget to ask for discount
body:
Dear valued member.
Buy your drugs from the comfort of your home and save up to 20% on pharmaceutical products with MyCanadianPharmacy. 
Your health and wellness is the main focus of our professional team and we are glad to offer you really top quality products. 
Click here to get more informationhttp://showweek.hk
Our customers appreciate the level of our service and fast delivery.
Sincerely yours,Christina Knapp
